Death of sibling

Source: R/gss_vars_84.R
sibdeath.Rd

sibdeath

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question D. Death of sibling or sibling-in-law

Values

  • [0] no death reported

  • [1] died 6+ yrs ago

  • [2] died 1-5 yrs ago

  • [3] died last year

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook

Question Years and Ballots

ballotsyears
-/-1978, 1980, 1983, 1984, 1986, 1987
B/C1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, 1993, 1994

Overview

For further details see the GSS Data Explorer page for sibdeath.
